definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Today one-third of the people on Greenland earn their living in the fishing industry.
sentences.chinese: 今天格陵蘭島上有三分之一的人在捕魚業中謀生。

sentences.english: Denmark's territory includes the Faeroe Islands and Greenland in the Arctic Circle.
sentences.chinese: 丹麥領土包括北極圈內的法羅羣島和格陵蘭島。

sentences.english: Melting ice in Greenland threatens to raise sea levels.
sentences.chinese: 格陵蘭島的融冰已威脅着海水的上漲。

sentences.english: The Shetlanders are an island race.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最大的島嶼是格陵蘭島。

sentences.english: The East Greenland Current flows southward from the Arctic along the island’s eastern coast, carrying sea ice with it.
sentences.chinese: 攜帶着海冰，沿着格陵蘭島東海岸從北極向南流動。

sentences.english: Aerial view of Ilulissat glacier, near Ilulissat, Greenland on July 3.
sentences.chinese: 鳥瞰伊盧利薩特冰川附近，格陵蘭島，於7月3日。

sentences.english: Here’s Europe. The big white thing is Greenland.
sentences.chinese: 這是歐洲，而這個大大的白點就是格陵蘭島。

sentences.english: The ice covering Greenland is about hundreds of meters thick.
sentences.chinese: 覆蓋格陵蘭島的冰大約有幾百米厚。

sentences.english: In Greenland two huge chunks of ice broke off in July and August.
sentences.chinese: 七月和八月，格陵蘭島兩個巨大的冰塊脫落。

sentences.english: West and north of Greenland, sea ice appears pale gray-blue.
sentences.chinese: 在格陵蘭島的西部和北部，海冰呈淡淡的灰藍色。

sentences.english: To get around in Greenland you have to fly.
sentences.chinese: 如果想參觀格陵蘭島，那就得靠飛機了。

sentences.english: 2010 was an exceptional year for Greenland’s ice cap.
sentences.chinese: 2010年對格陵蘭島的冰帽來說是不同尋常的一年。

sentences.english: In Greenland, it's meltwater greasing the way for massive outflows of ice.
sentences.chinese: 在格陵蘭島，是冰水增加了大量的冰流出的渠道。

sentences.english: 6Floating ice fills a harbor in Ilulissat, Greenland, on July 18, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 浮冰漂在格陵蘭島伊盧利薩特的港口。
